code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{evaluateRule}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RuleEvaluator=()=>{const[ruleId,setRuleId]=useState('');const[userData,setUserData]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const data=JSON.parse(userData);const evaluationResult=await evaluateRule(ruleId,data);setResult(evaluationResult.result);}catch(error){alert('Error evaluating rule: '+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:ruleId,onChange:e=>setRuleId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Rule ID",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:userData,onChange:e=>setUserData(e.target.value),placeholder:"User Data (JSON format)",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Evaluate Rule"}),result!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Result: ",result?'True':'False']})]});};export default RuleEvaluator;
